entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Harrow AAFC 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning later this morning changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with freezing rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of freezing drizzle overnight. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Drizzle or periods of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
